sequence:
Long Island's Inner Peace

<size=45>IV 「The Proper Relaxation Method」</size>

scripts.say: Hmph... don’t think that you can change my lazy nature!
I’m going to be busy, so please don’t bother me ---
What am I busy with? Playing, of course!
Ah, since the Commander is also here, then help me take care of these things---
Hehe, with the Commander's help, I don't need to go out, just as I planned~
